items.title: Trump to host signing of peace deal between leaders of DR Congo and Rwanda
items.description: The US president hopes that a peace deal will pave the way for greater American investment in the resource-rich region.

items.title: Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi
items.description: BBC editors explain what is at stake as Russian President Vladimir Putin starts a two-day visit to India.

items.title: Israel says Palestinian groups returned body of Thai hostage held in Gaza
items.description: The remains of agricultural worker Suthisak Rintalak were recovered by Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad in northern Gaza.

items.title: Ukraine and US negotiators to meet in Florida after Moscow talks, White House says
items.description: US special envoy Steve Witkoff will meet senior Ukrainian negotiator, Rustem Umerov, for talks in Miami on Thursday.

items.title: Previously unseen images of Epstein's island released
items.description: The new images come as a deadline for the broader release of documents held by the US government looms.
